meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marques Redd Brittany Rogers Thomas Zamora Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3959.

div.div:
2001 College Championship semifinal game 2.
From the campus at UCLA.

td.p: Marques Redd, a sophomore at Harvard University from Macon, Georgia
Brittany Rogers, a sophomore at Saddleback College from Lake Forest, California
Thomas Zamora, a junior at the University of Southern California from Cypress, California

tr.td: (Alex: A category about the American Classics series.)
TURNING PRO
COLLEGE WORLD
MAMMALS
WHAT ARE YOU AFRAID OF?
TO "L" AND BACK
(Alex: And in that last category, each correct response will begin and end with the letter L.)

Marques
